name: battlcry
story:
Battlecry is a 2D side-scrolling brawler and versus fighting game that puts players in the shoes of a muscled guy named Mac who can do kick, role, punch and jump attacks. Mac has to fight against fighters from across the USA.

In the single-player mode you have to defeat a few weaker enemies before the main boss can be fought. If enough have been defeated a rope ladder will appear that will transport you the main boss. The two-player mode plays like a one-on-one versus fighter.
